ygData.subject: Re: Feign Death
ygData.msgSnippet: whats absolutly Kills me is that some clerics triedn to get some things changed about their class and the response was. Thanks for the feedback. At this point
ygData.messageBody:
whats absolutly Kills me is that some clerics triedn to get some things
changed about their class and the response was.



Thanks for the feedback. At this point in the game, we really can't
change how the Cleric class works. There are too many people who chose the
class because of the way that it is. I do appreciate your suggestions, and
will use them if we ever work on another project similar to EQ.

Good luck!


so with this staement in mind remove the word cleric and insert the word
monk ! WTF verant?
----- Original Message -----
From: Sheldon Jolson <Sheldon_Jolson@...>
To: <EQ-Monks@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, November 17, 1999 7:38 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Feign Death


> From: "Sheldon Jolson" <Sheldon_Jolson@...>

> Nice of them to tell us. If you look at the wording, the only reason

> the patch message, it seems. Does this bother anyone else?
